Description:
Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file

Author: Michael Haag, FPT.EagleEye
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: File Download Via Bitsadmin
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\bitsadmin.exe' and original_file_name = 'bitsadmin.exe') and (command like '% /transfer %' or (command like '%http%' and (command like '% /create %' or command like '% /addfile %'))))
